title: Internal compiler error when using 'extern create num;'
body:
```
rustc -v
rustc 0.11.0-pre-nightly (410d70b 2014-06-18 05:26:38 +0000)
host: x86_64-apple-darwin
```

OSX 10.9.1

Simple test program causes this.

```
extern crate num;

fn main() { }
```

Backtrace:

